title: Full-Time Virtual Assistant – Web Master / Landing Page Expert (WordPress + Elementor)
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing real estate company based in the U.S. and we’re looking for a full-time, long-term Virtual Assistant with strong skills in website design, landing page creation, and front-end development. If you have experience in WordPress (Elementor), HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and know your way around Google Ads or Meta Ads (bonus!) — we want you on our team!

???? What You'll Be Doing:
Build and maintain high-converting landing pages for lead generation

Manage and update our WordPress sites using Elementor

Customize pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

Troubleshoot and fix bugs or design issues

Ensure websites are fast, mobile-friendly, and SEO optimized

Support marketing team with custom pages for digital campaigns

BONUS: Assist with Google Ads or Meta (Facebook/Instagram) Ads setup and management
